message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $85. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to experience its value without breaking the bank. Looking forward to your response!
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective and would like to propose a price of $80 for the product. This still allows us to maintain a fair value for both parties involved. I hope this meets your expectations.
